root.name: Senran Kagura Burst
root.description: OverviewIn this sequel to the original Senran Kagura, players will be able to take control of the original protagonists' rivals. The game will also feature new 3D elements with players being able to dress the girls in the "locker room" while being able to view the mode in 3D. The sequel will also have the original Senran Kagura: Portrait of Girls on the game card with Burst's updated gameplay and features. The game will be published in North America by XSEED as a 3DS eShop-only title while Zen United will publish the game across Europe both on the eShop and as a retail product.
